Wisdom: الْفِعْلُ الْجَمِيلُ يُنْبِئُ عَنْ عُلُوِّ الْهِمَّةِ
enWisdom: Beautiful action indicates strong determination [and earnest effort]

Wisdom: بِحُسْنِ الْعَمَلِ تُجْنَى [يُجْنَى‏] ثَمَرَةُ الْعِلْمِ لَا بِحُسْنِ الْقَوْلِ
enWisdom: It is by good action that the fruit of knowledge is reaped, not by good speech

Wisdom: جَمِيلُ الْفِعْلِ يُنْبِئُ عَنْ طِيبِ الْأَصْلِ
enWisdom: Beautiful action declares the goodness of the source

Wisdom: حُسْنُ التَّوْفِيقِ خَيْرُ مُعِينٍ وَحُسْنُ الْعَمَلِ خَيْرُ قَرِينٍ
enWisdom: God-given success is the best helper and good action is the best associate

Wisdom: حُسْنُ الْعَمَلِ خَيْرُ ذُخْرٍ وَأَفْضَلُ عُدَّةٍ
enWisdom: Virtuous action is the best provision and the greatest asset
Good action is the substantiation of good words
The goodness of the Hereafter is [attained] through good deeds
The correctness of action [and behaviour] beautifies a person

Wisdom: كَيْفِيَّةُ الْفِعْلِ تَدُلُّ عَلَى كَيْفِيَّةِ الْعَقْلِ فَأَحْسِنْ لَهُ الِاخْتِيَارَ [الِاخْتِبَارَ] وَأَكْثِرْ عَلَيْهِ الِاسْتِظْهَارَ
enWisdom: The manner of action points to the measure of intelligence, so make good choices for it and be more precautious with regards to it
Whoever makes his actions good, attains his hopes

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ الْعَمَلَ حَسُنَتْ لَهُ الْمُكَافَاةُ
enWisdom: One whose action is action, his requital will be good

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ أَفْعَالَهُ أَعْرَبَ مِنْ وُفُورِ عَقْلِهِ
enWisdom: One who makes his actions good demonstrates the abundance of his intellect
One who is assisted by God-given success does good work

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ عَمَلُهُ بَلَغَ مِنَ اللَّهِ أَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: One whose action is good attains from Allah what he hopes for

Wisdom: مَنْ سَلِمَ مِنَ الْمَعَاصِي عَمَلُهُ بَلَغَ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ أَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: One whose action is free from sin attains his hope from the Hereafter
What a good provision [for the Hereafter] good action is!

Wisdom: لَا يَتِمُّ حُسْنُ الْقَوْلِ إِلَّا بِحُسْنِ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: Good speech is not completed except by good action
